pipelet-node.custom-name: Search all orders that are ready to be exported ((EXPORT_STATUS_READY || EXPORT_STATUS_FAILED) && CONFIRMATION_STATUS_CONFIRMED && !ORDERSTATUS_CANCELLED) && PAYMENT_STATUS_PAID

config-property.value: (exportStatus={1} OR exportStatus={4}) AND confirmationStatus={2} AND status!={3} AND paymentStatus={5}

pipelet-node.custom-name: Search all orders that are ready to be exported ((EXPORT_STATUS_READY || EXPORT_STATUS_FAILED) && !ORDERSTATUS_CANCELLED)

key-binding.alias: CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Order export finished, no orders found for export.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Catalog export finished, no Catalog could be matched to the folowing ID:" + CatalogID + ".",'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Catalog export finished, no Catalog ID was found.",'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Price-Book export finished, no Price-Book could be matched to the folowing ID:" + PriceBookID + ".",'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Price-Book export finished, no Price-Book ID was found.",'ERROR')
